name: afastidioushat
text: A comment left by afastidioushat was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by mortshire, the_dingle, chaesar)

name: fattypneumonia
text: Throw in Ted Danson's skeleton, and you've got yourself a goddamn deal.

name: zem
text: I like the way he tilts his head from side to side

name: deimosrising
text: I don't know if Chris knew or intended this, but it's actually a very common kind of body language in rural West Virginia, from whence Pete originates (as do I).

name: cryptfiend85
text: I'd give him the benefit of the doubt.

name: sargasm
text: Yeah.  Achewood is incredibly well-grounded in literature, culture, etc. for a comic strip.

name: everything_is_a_hat
text: and that's just part or Onstad's genius with Achewood.

name: dusty
text: I feel like you guys are about to tell me how I can get it all for just 3 easy payments and cancel any time with no obligation.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: In all things, when you're alone in a cell with him.

name: atticusonline
text: I really thought it was very common body language for a murderer

name: soticoto
text:
*Tilts head to one side*

Oh?

*Tilts the other way*

Is that so?

name: saint
text: he always looks like he's explaining something to child...even when he's mutilating himself in front of them.

name: spinynorman
text: A comment left by spinynorman was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Bartleby, unquotable, Bootsy)

name: bixschmix
text: And you know Nice Pete got hell of Chiblains. Picked most of them up in El Paso that one summer he doesn't talk about.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: 1997 was a strange year for Peter H. Cropes.

name: mustakrakesh
text: I always think of Nice Pete having the mannerisms of Dana Carvey impersonating George Bush Sr.

name: tekende
text: "Ain't gonna give another man kisses. Wouldn't be prudent."

name: berami
text: I can kind of see him bobbing his head forwards and back  to emphasis words. Not necessarily in regards to the words importance, mostly in a sort of sing-song.

name: nyu
text: This is the description of Onstad's true artistic vision for achewood if only he didn't have to bend to demands for rock. hard. catcock.

name: overmedicated
text: Please, please tell me rock. hard. catcock. is not Achewood's first meme already.

name: nyu
text: First? Nay.

name: hollis
text: A comment left by hollis was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by featurelessvoid, ButterMoths, jdhenry105, erributtz, thunderbat, trout, aHatOfPig, mugi, bixschmix, Doc_Rostov, peterjoel, pulkbaby, STUART)

name: overmedicated
text: A comment left by overmedicated was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by shammack, Afkpuz, SotiCoto)

name: stuart
text: A comment left by stuart was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ButterMoths, Jesler729, jezebel, Crater12, Badgerus, vucubcaquix, tellumo)

name: mastronaut
text: i signed up for the messageboard strictly to see what everyone thought was so lame. my lame threshold is at 50 just so i can catch asherdans comments.

name: heccibiggs
text: That was exactly my reasoning as well.

name: wite_rabit
text: I joined expressly because the above commenter is ENTHRALLING.

name: heccibiggs
text: Who? You don't mean me, do you? Please not me. I have enough Assetstalkers, I think.

name: wite_rabit
text: Nah, not to stalk you - just to chubby your comments and also to read those of Asherdan.

name: shutup_shutup
text:
That... that is one of the saddest kind of stalkers I have ever heard of.

The internet is horrible .

name: bobbieluvsya
text: Mine's at 500. Just in case, you know?

name: quinlaenar
text: Mine was at like 99. And then I saw a comment that had more than 600 lames. I set it to 999999 after that, so I would only see comments that a million people think are lame.

name: a_dude
text: I wonder what nice pete sounds like.....

name: dropkickpikachu
text: I picture his voice nearly identical to Senator Jim Calhoun's.

name: mckayle
text: YES.  It is also the hands, but that is immediately who I think of when I see Nice Pete now.  Also, I think it is Tim.

name: nyu
text: Kind of a higher pitched but still mellow Christopher Walkin.

name: kilroywashere
text: I always heard something like Emo Phillips, myself.

name: perhapsmaybe
text: JUST TRY looking at the second panel and blinking. Pete's death stare will keep you creeped.

name: aaron_haynes
text: The stare was the best part of the early Pete strips. Something about him staring at you and not responding for several seconds rings eerily true. Like he's trying to deduce your motives and figure out the appropriate response (which might be killing you).

name: spinynorman
text:
In that second of silent time there's an almost audible CLICK as Pete's brain has to first formulate a response, then figure out how to express it, and then begin.

What you are hearing is the switch that goes between HUMAN <--- INHUMAN

name: tekende
text: Or in this case CAT <--- UN-CAT

name: cpnglxynchos
text: God, i cannot chuppy you enough for these.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: also, for future reference, should he ever make the mistake again, daidai's avicon for an Age has been panel two of this comic, Nice Pete's stare. an empty comment speaks for itself in only this manner.

name: griffypoo
text: This comment is in dire need of chubbiness.

name: landowmpg
text: I just burst out laughing at my desk.

name: stuart
text: Holy shit. My eyes watered up. I... I had to look away.

name: heccibiggs
text:
Jesus, when I read your comment I thought, "yeah funny, but hell of exaggerating", but you're totally not.

Chubby for being so spot on.

name: charchar
text: It is especially unsettling to consider this is a drawing of a cat with a moustache yet it has this effect on people.  Thank god Onstad uses his powers only for good.

name: epicurus
text: Showing this strip to someone is a good test to see if they have a real sense of humour or if they are Lame.

name: norrin
text: What if they just think you're telling them you're a murderer?

name: epicurus
text: OHHHHHH SHIIIIIIIITTTTT!!!!

name: heccibiggs
text: My friends at college totally passed.

name: afkpuz
text:
I like how there is a pause before he begins to speak.

Such timing. Beautiful.

name: deancain29
text: Nice Pete is awesome

name: darkwaffle
text: I think creating said picture would make an excellent Achecontest.

name: stuart
text: Show us all your best murders guys

name: professoryes
text: Oh fiddlesticks, my BEST murders are on another memory stick.

name: jinxtigr
text: What, ALL of them?

name: griffypoo
text: Mine are all in a slideshow organized from normal to triple-A style.

name: rowboat
text: I, for one, am shocked and saddened that none of you photoshop savvy people are on the ball with this. We computer idiots depend on you for these things. We got, like, twenty pictures of Selma Hayek's tits and not one fully clothed child saying a picture of murder. C'mon people!

name: stuart
text: It's because I prefer to delegate the Google Image Searching for "murder" to something my roommates do in their spare time thanks

name: evolume
text: Nice Pete kinda looks like Ben Affleck to me, for some reason.

name: cousinted
text: My favourite part of this is the way Nice Pete slowly cocks his head from one side to the other, like a crow sizing up a sparrow.

name: songbirdspectre
text: The crazy cat explains things as if he is explaining them to a small child.

name: pitseleh
text: I love how there's some time missing from the when Nice Pete asked Pat how he feels about two men kissing. Now it's open for speculation.

name: professoryes
text:
That point makes me recall when Pat asked Philippe about his political platform. I imagine pre-curse Pat got righteous about homosexual rights, but he used it as an awful insult when he got angry.

Alternately: He hated gays.

name: redmad
text: Pete shows too much emotion nowadays. These early ones are genius.

name: foxtrotamend
text: Nice Pete's hand gestures make this strip so much more awesome.

name: professorhazard
text: He has a serious case of Bill Clinton Lecture Hand.

name: cameasiam
text: Man, I am now the dude who said "this is the first achewood strip I read and have been hooked ever since." Oh and I have been reading the archives too much, my girlfriend said something funny this evening and I told her I gave her joke a chubby. It took me awhile to explain.

name: slab64
text: Chubbied.

name: origotoshi
text: Did you demonstrate by literally giving her a chubby?

name: hazelfo
text: Nice Pete's every action is a glorious art.

name: highpitch_83
text: The introduction of nice Pete turns the entire strip up to 11... so creepy yet SO hilarious!

name: aliiis
text: roooooough chuckles :(

name: atticusonline
text: [IMGS OFF]

name: goddessdictator
text: Most excellent. perfection. wait for everyone to find it and your chubby count will sky rocket.

name: wonelove
text: exactly

name: jollysaintpete
text: gwot da fock

name: boredom_man
text:
Atticus

It would be right for me to give Gregory Peck kisses, don't you think

name: atticusonline
text:
As long as we can play basketball

and I am the winner

name: usversusthem
text:
Has anyone considered that Nice Pete might just be an ornithology enthusiast?

[IMGS OFF]

name: atticusonline
text: Murders, not birders.

name: griffypoo
text: Group of crows.  C'mon, man.

name: anticitizen
text: why the fuck is this creepier than atticus' murder one??

name: atticusonline
text: I imagine the child screeching. It works that way.

name: woodenteeth
text: I imagine the child is screeching with the voices of a thousand birds.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: Lain got nothin' on this kid.

name: fattypneumonia
text: Meh.

name: mockereo
text: ohigetityouweretalkingaboutagroupofcrowsnotthetakingofanotherhumanlife. a stretch for that pun i think

name: rowboat
text: Hey! I never saw this down here! I never got a chance to thank you! Thank, you atticusonline!

name: watt
text: Nice Pete, for my money, is the most consistent Achewood character.

name: ishuta
text: [IMGS OFF]

name: howl
text: kitten thinks of nothing but murder all day

name: theguitarhero
text: Yours is a literal interpretation. Nice Pete is a cat, so when he says "child" he means "kitten".

name: mangtastic
text: Damn. If wearing tube socks and a tank top AND NOTHING ELSE during a murder doesn't just make it the worst then I don't know what does.

name: genequagmire
text:
Epic.

He looks like the little clicky head creatures from Mononoke. The name escapes me at the moment.
